text: Surrender is the third studio album by Diana Ross. It was released on 6 July, 1971 through Motown Records. It went to number 10 in the United Kingdom, number 56 in the United States and number 46 in Canada. ==Track listing== All arrangements by Paul Riser.Liner notes: Motown LP M 723, 1971. ===Original release=== ===2008 expanded edition=== ==References== Category:1971 albums Category:Diana Ross albums
title: Surrender (Diana Ross album)
